entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
